text:
Iâ€™m using a Private App, and using the Webhook feature to pass further requests on to HubSpot Serverless Functions.

However, I am not getting a `X-HubSpot-Signature` header in order to authenticate. Have I misunderstood something here?

```  "headers": {
    "X-IP-Country": "US",
    "true-client-ip": "--",
    "User-Agent": "HubSpot Connect 2.0 (<http://dev.HubSpot.com/>) (namespace: webhooks-nio-http-client) - WebhooksExecutorDaemon-executor",
    "x-client-ip": "--",
    "Accept-Encoding": "gzip, br",
    "cf-bot-score": "2",
    "cf-verified-bot": "false",
    "cf-device-type": "desktop",
    "Content-Length": "321",
    "Content-Type": "application/json",
    "Accept": "*/*",
    "Connection": "close",
    "Host": "--<http://.hs-sites-eu1.com|.hs-sites-eu1.com>",
    "traceparent": "00-e61d49eefa3330f262ab2aca97812c06-702e03c38a3926c8-00",
    "X-Forwarded-For": "2a06:98c0:3600::103, 172.70.248.59, 2a06:98c0:3600::103",
    "True-Client-IP": "143.244.87.78"
  },```
